question: Who become the first wicketkeeper to effect 100 stumpings in ODI cricket?
explanation: MS Dhoni reached a record of 100 stumpings in One-Day Internationals during his 301st match, as India played Sri Lanka in the fifth ODI of the five-match series at Colombo. He became the sixth Indian player to play 300 matches in the 50-over format. Dhoni has also played 90 Tests and 77 T20 Internationals. In 90 Tests, Dhoni has taken 256 catches and effected 38 stumpings while his T20 Internationals' catches/stumping record stands at 43/23.
